section.name: Mailbox Store Responsibility
section.p: The Mailbox Store is responsible for all "common/util" implementations that can be used by the various Mailbox implementations.

section.name: Store Model
section.p: The main classes are the Mailbox and the Message. A Message contains a list of Property and a list of Header. A Subscription has a mailbox and a user attribute.

subsection.name: Store Mailbox Manager
subsection.p: All public and protected methods that can be used by a Mailbox Manager implementations.
You need to instanciate the StoreMailboxManager with a mailboxSessionMapperFactory, an authenticator, a uidProvider and a mailboxPathlocker.

subsection.name: Store Message Manager
subsection.p: All public and protected methods that can be used by a Message Manager implementations.
You need to instanciate the StoreMessageManager with a messageSessionMapperFactory, a uidProvider, a mailboxEventDispatcher and a mailbox.

subsection.name: Store Subscription Manager
subsection.p: All public and protected methods that can be used by a Subscription Manager implementations.
You need to instanciate the StoreSubscriptionManager with a subscriptionSessionMapperFactory.
